title: College of Swords
content:
- Level 7 Bard 3 4 3 3 1 - - Level 8 Bard 3 4 3 3 2 - - Level 9 Bard 3 4 3 3 3 1 - Level 10 Bard 4 4 3 3 3 2 - Level 11 Bard 4 4 3 3 3 2 1 Level 12 Bard 4 4 3 3 3 2 1

BG3 COLLEGE OF SWORDS TIPS & BUILDS

College of Swords Bards have the possibility to select a fighting style at level 3. College of Swords bards have to select between Dueling or Two-Weapon Fighting NEW! - New Spells have been added to the Bard's Magical Secrets Spells List in Patch #1, released on August 25, 2023.

ALL BARD SPELL
